title: Voidborn Aussies - A fun team looking for players who just want to have fun, Everyone welcome
body:
Hi guys and girls. I am making a ranked team or a bit of a league of legends gaming community whatever you want to call it. Everyone is welcome and encouraged to join up, 
The Voidborn Aussies is looking for every role, every type of person and anyone willing to make new friends to have fun playing league of legends with. Our main goal is to just have fun playing.
We will play normals, ranked 5v5's and ranked 3v3's (hopefully when the put it on this server) whenever we can and climb the ranked ladders together.
Put your details and I will add you in game, this helps the team get to know each other quicker.
IGN:
Age:
Rank:
Role:
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others*
Reason for wanting to join this team :
THAT IS ALL :D

replies.body:
IGN: GBG727
Age: 23
Rank: B5 -__-
Role: main is mid but can sup
Preferred social media: skype
Reason for wanting to join this team : Just want to have some fun ^^
THAT IS ALL :D

IGN: BM Angie

Age: 16

Rank: Silver 5 (season 4)

Role: I enjoy any role. But I do have some mistakes in jungling.

Preferred social media: Skype: angi3awesome

Reason for wanting to join this team : I enjoy playing League with people. It's really boring playing by myself. I also want to be able to use my ranked experience, mistakes, plays and knowledge to hone my skills.

IGN: Istezz

Age: 17 (18 this May)

Rank: Gold 3 (previously Silver 1 in season 4)

Role: Jungle, Mid or Adc but I can also play Top and Support well

Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* TS or Skpye

Reason for wanting to join this team : Need new people to play with and improve my overall game.

IGN: Worst Quinn Ever
Age: 27 ( Yes i'm old :( )
Rank: B5
Role: Anywhere but jungle
Preferred social media: none at the moment
Reason for wanting to join this team : I'm looking for positive players who can help me improve and help me point out all my mistakes but won't judge me to harshly for it.

I'm from the NA servers so I don't know the time difference yet.

Add us PREETY R
IGN: PREETY R
AGE: ~
ROLE: Top (Kennen)
Skype available
Unranked (never got round to playing my placements)

IGN: Undew
Age: 15
Rank: Bronze IV
Role: ADC, Mid
Preferred social media: Skype, ts
Reason for wanting to join this team: I think this could be a good way for me to improve as a player in map awareness, It could teach me things I never knew but i think most of all I want to just play with people that aren't toxic and will work as a team (its a rare thing in bronze xD)
Awesome, added you

Aw, there are so many applications already. I hope this isn't too late.

IGN: Sunlit Earth
Age: 22
Rank: Gold V
Role: Top, ADC, support, *possibly* jungle
Preferred social media: Skype
Reason for wanting to join this team: I've always wanted to join a team that would be open to playing casually but never got around to finding or making one myself. It's a good opportunity to meet new people.
Awesome, i added you :)
Hm, I didn't receive a request? - nvm, I added you.
Lol

IGN: Cordellat
Age: 24
Rank: In EU i was gold, now im silver 1 (for the server change) but i will be gold again
Role: jungler or suport (high) adc (midium well)
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* skype its okey
Reason for wanting to join this team : I like the games in high level. also all of the games i have flamers or afk people... i dont enjoy the game like this. Add me even if is only for play rankeds duo or normal games guys :)
Awesome, i sent a friend request, add when you can and welcome :)

IGN: Frankium
Age: 19
Rank: Silver 4
Role: adc/top
Preferred social media: Skype (can use ts, vent, etc)
Reason for wanting to join this team: Climb the rankings and do some damage
Awesome, sent a friend request :)

IGN: Seriff
Age: 22
Rank: Gold 5
Role: Prefer jungle but i'll play anything im not really fussed
Preferred social media: Anything bar teamspeak it doesnt work for me for some reason. 
Reason for wanting to join this team : Ranked 5's!!!!!!
This sounds quite fun :) add me if you need some more people still "Dwok"
Cool, there are 2 teams at the moment and the 2nd team is still looking, i added you so accept if your interested and welcome :)

IGN: archjuggler
Age: 17
Rank: diamond 5
Role: support
Preferred social media: Skype
Reason: Hit diamond 5 so finding little to do, and wanting to chill and play with people as a group rather then soloq
Cool, i added you and welocme :)

IGN: Gnole
Silver 1
skype / curse talk
Cool, added you :)
I cant see u :/

IGN: UnicornBaconFat
Age: 22
Rank: Silver I
Role: Fill or feed
Preferred social media: Skype
Reason for wanting to join this team: Don't like playing with ragey randoms. Tryharding is good, but too many people don't know how not to rage
Awesome, welcome to the group, :)

IGN: Gixa
Age: 23 
Gender: Yes please
League of Legends tattoos: 2 
Rank: Silver 5
Role: Support {{champion:89}} 
Preferred Social Media: Skype
Reason for wanting to join this team: Not wanting to queue with randoms. Prefer knowing the skill level of my teammates and what playing styles they sync well with.
Awesome, welcome, the first ranked team is filled but there will be a second ranked team and and really this is more like a community, so welcome :)

IGN: 420 lemon haze
age: 20
rank: gold 5
role: adc
preferred social media: skype
Reason for wanting to join this team: wanna have some fun and i enjoy playing with people more than solo
Awesome, added you :)

IGN: Knuuckles
Age: 19
Rank: s3 
Role: mid or supp pref dont mind which one
prefer curse
reason: sick of try hard teams that get angry over every little thing
Welcome, hopefully not everyone gets angry over everything :)

> [{quoted}](name=Lapras2,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=0dHNEfjF,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2014-12-18T09:47:29.725+0000)
>
> Welcome, hopefully not everyone gets angry over everything :)

ragers are my pet peeve and ill be sure to add you once the chat services are back online

IGN: DiddlyDonger
Age: 17
Rank: Silver 3
Role: Support
Preferred social media: skype. I have teamspeak but only use it when no one has skype (which is rare)
Reason for wanting to join this team : Just looking for a fun team and an opportunity to make some cool friends 8-)
Awesome, WELCOME!! :)

IGN: Bigblock20k
Age: 18
Rank: Bronze 3
Role: JG ADC MID SUPP TOP
Preferred social media: skype
Reason for wanting to join this team : i prefer playing with a full team or duo rather than by myself (dont solo Q much)
Welcome, i agree full team way better to play with :)

IGN: Typhoid Mary
Age:18
Rank: g4
Role :pref mid or adc but can fill just as easy
Social Media: skype, curse
Reasons: just for for fun maybe climb the ladder a bit, team is better than randoms
Welcome, i agree that teams is better than randoms, hence this thread lol :)

IGN: k0riok0 (they're zero's, not O's)

Age: 21
Gender: male (shouldn't matter tbh)
Rank: Gold 5
Role: Support generally but can mid and top :)
Social media: Skype or curse voice, ask me over league, prefer not to post
Reasons: just for fun and never done a ranked 5s game so thought I would give it a try
Welcome, yeah the gender does not matter, its just there, (idk why lol)

IGN:BreakableMALS
Age: 23
Gender: Male
Rank: Bronze 1
Role: Support
Preferred social media: skype, curse

Awesome
Welcome :)

IGN: Mar3thyu
Age:16
Rank: Silver 5

Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* Any that don't give me lag haven't used them b4

Awesome :)
Added you, accept when you can :)
IGN: Huckleberry KOR
Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make ranked teams.
